location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council etc., Bombay

mods.abstract: Riach informs Elphinstone that Catchatoor Johannes had, at Shiraz, endorsed three sets of bills of exchange on the Honourable Board in favour of three named persons who had been involved with His Majesty's mission to Persia. The bills had been drawn by Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires at Tehran. Riach further explains the circumstances in which Johannes had been sent to Shiraz.
